title: Snap shares surge
text:
Snap shares surge   02:07 
Shares of Snapchat owner Snap rose after the company beat expectations for fourth quarter revenue and reported an acceleration in growth of active users for the first time since IPO. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Shares of Snapchat owner Snap rose after the company beat expectations for fourth quarter revenue and reported an acceleration in growth of active users for the first time since IPO.
